Projects

Golfbreaks - Customer Portal

As part of my work for Golfbreaks, I was a big part in developing our customer portal. This is built with REACT JS. It is a logged-in portal with lots of functionality. The work involved APIs, interactive components and responsive design, as well as complicated business logic.

As part of my work for Golfbreaks, I do a lot of developing on the main website. For this we use NUXT and Vue JS. Events Hub is an entire feature of the website that I built, which includes a checkout process, and lots of nice visual elements also.
